// src/Pagamento.js import { useLocation } from 'react-router-dom'; import { useState } from 'react'; export default function Pagamento() { const location = useLocation(); const searchParams = new URLSearchParams(location.search); const price = searchParams.get('valor'); const [selectedMethod, setSelectedMethod] = useState('pix'); const [loading, setLoading] = useState(false); const handlePaymentClick = (method) => { setLoading(true); setSelectedMethod(method); // Simulação de processamento de pagamento setTimeout(() => setLoading(false), 1200); }; const formatPrice = (value) => { return parseFloat(value).toLocaleString('pt-BR', { style: 'currency', currency: 'BRL' }); }; return (
